items.title: Logitech’s MX Master 3S Bluetooth wireless mouse with quiet switches is down to its lowest price at $80
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s MX Master 3S Bluetooth wireless mouse in Graphite colorway down to $79.99 shipped. This version – which is compatible with both Mac and Windows – typically goes for $100, so you’re looking at 20% markdown on it today. We’ve seen the variant of this keyboard with a USB receiver go for a touch less at $76, but today’s deals on this Bluetooth Edition model shaves $20 off its usual going rate to mark the return of its lowest price. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
Today only, as part of its Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy has listed HP’s OmniBook 3 AMD-powered Copilot+ laptop for $449.99 shipped. This is one of the more affordable models HP has in its OmniBook line, which is now seeing a straight-up $350 on its $800 usual going rate. It dropped to the $450 mark once before ahead of the Black Friday sale last year as part of a similar Deals of the Day offer, and today’s deal marks the return of that price to make it easier on your wallet. It’s the most affordable AMD-powered Copilot+ laptop you can get your hands on right now, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

The retailer’s new 3-day Mega Deal Zone sale offers some notable markdowns on MacBooks, workstation monitors, camera gear, and more, and the prices for the items included in the sale start at just $1.99 shipped. B&H is also offering some deals on SSDs at the moment, which is definitely a surprise considering how the prices have been steadily increasing lately as part of the global memory shortage. If you’ve been missing out on the classic GameCube experience with your Switch 2, this PowerA controller is a great fix – especially since it’s just $30 today.
